content:
So VSCode 1.62 broke semantic highlighting for us again(this happened some time ago if I remember correctly) it seems, typing now flickers :grimacing: https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/10690
So if you are still on 1.61 or earlier better don't update like I just did :sweat:
Hmm, I barely see it. I have to bang on my keyboard or hold a key pressed and it will flicker softly
it gets worse for larger files, that is for files we take longer to highlight
